name: Elder Scrolls or Fallout 4 Relative Save Data
summary: A TES file is a saved data file used by The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, or Fallout 4, which are video games developed by Bethesda Softworks. It contains game save data that is applied to an associated .ESP, .ESM, or .ESL file and used to maintain changes a player makes to the games' in-game environment.
